translations: 俱乐部会员；挥舞棍棒的人

sentences.sentence: The venue was packed with 3 000 clubbers.
sentences.translation: 会场被3 000名俱乐部会员挤得满满的。

sentences.sentence: Clubbers dance the morning away in June 2007 on Ibiza.
sentences.translation: 伊比沙岛2007年6月，人们在俱乐部跳舞至天明。

sentences.sentence: Clubbers will be asked to have their right index finger scanned and show picture identification to register on the system.
sentences.translation: 进入这些场所的人将被要求对其右手食指进行扫描，并且出示照片证明以登陆这一系统。
